author: PlayStation
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through Talos, a colossal fortress that has swallowed entire civilizations over the centuries. As Europa, a fierce warrior who has lost everything, you must battle through the corrupted depths of this labyrinthine stronghold, uncover its secrets, and bring life back to a world robbed of its colors.
With only your halberd and the aid of your spectral companion, Apino, you will confront tainted creatures, and harness elemental powers to overcome the looming curse.

Guided by the healing power of music, you will meet legendary composers who lend their talents to your quest.

9 Years of Shadows offers a rich and immersive experience, blending fast-paced combat, exploration, and a mesmerizing soundtrack featuring compositions by Michiru Yamane (Castlevania series) and Norihiko Hibino (Metal Gear Solid series).

Will you be the one to break the cycle of despair and restore the world’s lost harmony?

Key Features
- A Metroidvania adventure like no other: E
title: 9 Years of Shadows - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Available March 18.

*Internet connection is required.

description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10001858/

In Crusader Kings III: Wards & Wardens, child rulers and child guardians take center stage. Its theme is the special challenge of rearing young princes and nobles in a world where eternal glory is a battle away, and danger lurks in every shadow. The Crusader Kings III: Wards & Wardens event pack is out now on PS5!
